BodyName: Minority (Republican) Conference of the Council of the City of New York

Items.Title: Appointments of Republican Elections Commissioner for: Richmond County, Michael J. Coppotelli; Kings County, Simon Shamoun; Queens County, Keith Sullivan; New York County, Fred Umane; Bronx County, Gino A. Marmorato and the election of Leader of the Minority (Republican) Conference of the Council.
Items.MinutesNote:
The vote of all five items was three in the affirmative, zero in the negative, and none abstaining with the exception of Michael Coppotelli which was two in the affirmative, zero in the negative, and one abstaining.

The vote for Minority Leader is three in the affirmative, zero negative, and zero abstentions.
Items.ActionText: A motion was made that this Petition be Approved by Committee approved by Roll Call.
Items.MatterName: Appointments of Republican Elections Commissioner for: Richmond County, Michael J. Coppotelli; Kings County, Simon Shamoun; Queens County, Keith Sullivan; New York County, Fred Umane; Bronx County, Gino A. Marmorato and the election of Leader of the Minor

Items.Title: AND SUCH OTHER BUSINESS AS MAY BE NECESSARY
